conbody.p: Eucalyptus installation packages are available for CentOS 5, CentOS 6, RHEL 5, RHEL 6, Ubuntu 10.04 LTS, and Ubuntu 12.04 LTS. The following sections show installation steps on each supported Linux distribution.
conbody.note: If you are installing Eucalyptus HA, pay attention to the extra steps noted in the instructions.
